snippet: Robert De Niro’s long challenge to his $6 million property assessment in Gardiner, Ulster County, deepened when his lawyers appealed a court ruling against him.
abstract: Appraisal column on Robert De Niro’s challenge to his $6 million property assessment in Gardiner, NY, in Ulster County, 75 miles north of Manhattan; it has turned into a grinding court battle that has cost the town more in legal fees than it stands to win; Riverside Trust, legal entity that owns the property for the De Niro family, has shown no inclination to back down.
lead_paragraph: Robert De Niro’s long challenge to his $6 million property assessment in Gardiner, Ulster County, deepened when his lawyers appealed a court ruling against him.

headline.main: De Niro, in Tax Fight, Wins Little Sympathy From His Neighbors
headline.print_headline: De Niro, in Tax Fight, Wins Little Sympathy From His Neighbors
